info.name: Roll20 - The One Ring (art library, journal, chat)
info.description:
Style for "The One Ring RPG on Roll20" that focus on Art library, Journal and Chat tabs.
Objectives : optimization in oder to see more information at a time (smaller font sizes) and use specific colors closed to The One Ring RPG books.
info.additionalInfo:
That style may be used along with the other style "The One Ring on Roll20" as they don't modify the same CSS objects.

That style starts with parameters where the user may quickly :
- change the colors to suit his personal taste
- change the font sizes to suit his screen and eyes

-- Update of 9th July 2019
Add CSS styling to the toolbar of token action and its buttons : for smaller and untransparent toolbar. Objective : Have a "smaller, less intrusive and easier to read" token action buttons.
